                </tr>
            
                <tr>
                    <th scope="row"><span style="font-weight: 400;"><strong>Bill account number</strong><br> </span></th>
                    <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">5-digit Member ID or 8-digit Contact Number</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Applicable to credit card payment</li>
</ul></td>

        </tbody>
